forecast.solar.lat: :lat - latitude of location, -90 (south) … 90 (north); handeled with a precission of 0.0001 or abt. 10 m
forecast.solar.long: :lon - longitude of location, -180 (west) … 180 (east); handeled with a precission of 0.0001 or abt. 10 m
forecast.solar.az: :az - plane azimuth, -180 … 180 (-180 = north, -90 = east, 0 = south, 90 = west, 180 = north); integer
forecast.solar.kwp: :kwp - installed modules power in kilo watt; float
